item.title: Zen and Art of Stack Ranking with Excel
item.description: Background Stack Ranking as the name implies is the process of stacking things or people up and applying a 1 to n rating to each. Unlike a standard performance rating, a ranking implies that no two employees should have the same assigned rank and that when you’re finished, someone will be number one and someone will be on the bottom of the pile. Stack Ranking the members of your team can be a loathsome task.

item.title: A Simple Excel Decision Matrix | The Lynn Decision Tool
